title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 6 categories on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Once or more per month is higher than any other categories with value 32.0, followed by At least once a week, and 7-12 times per year. Down to category Never with the lowest value of 4.0.
The highest value at Once or more per month is almost 8.0 times larger than the minimum value of Never.

The difference between the max Response Once or more per month and min Response Never is 28.0.
